description: Available in English. Please contact us if you need assistance with DigiPay.  DigiPay allows you to conduct business on your PayPal accounts. It is more than just an interface to PayPal. It’s a virtual terminal! After a brief setup you can manage an unlimited number of PayPal Accounts in one application with seamless switching. You assign each account a password to protect against unauthorized access to your financial records. Features include: Easy to Use, Account Balance, Accept/Deny Pending Payments, Send Money, Virtual Terminal, Issue Refunds, View Transaction History, Transaction Details, Phonebook Integration, and Multiple Currency support. As always friendly support is included.
versionNote: Improved error reporting and new version notification.
